snippet: To promote Seventeen to advertisers, Ms. Rubinstein dreamed up “Teena,” a girl who embodied the demographics and concerns of the magazine’s readers.
abstract: Estelle Ellis Rubinstein, pioneer at Seventeen magazine, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: To promote Seventeen to advertisers, Ms. Rubinstein dreamed up “Teena,” a girl who embodied the demographics and concerns of the magazine’s readers.

headline.seo: Estelle Ellis Rubinstein, a Pioneer at Seventeen, Dies at 92
